description:
With Sawatari and Notorious hot on their heels, Ninja Slayer and Nancy find a secret access point to the plant`s mainframe. Nancy tries to gain access to the mainframe, but is met with an unforeseen obstacle.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: One Minute Before the Tanuki Part 2
One Minute Before the Tanuki, Part 2
ワン・ミニット・ビフォア・ザ・タヌキ PART 2
